source:
spark.sql("""
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC (
        RefNo                           STRING,
        EthnicOrigin                    STRING,
        ReligiousDenominationKey        STRING,
        SxO                             STRING,
        DisabilityText                  STRING,
        file_name                       STRING,
        load_date                       STRING,
        Grade                           STRING
    )
    USING DELTA

%%sql

delete from odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC ;

insert into odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC(



SELECT 
	   RefNo
      ,NULLIF(EthnicOrigin, '')
      ,NULLIF(ReligiousDenominationKey, '')
      ,NULLIF(SxO, '')
      ,NULLIF(DisabilityText, '')
	  ,null as file_name
	  ,current_date(),
	   Grade

from odw_standardised_db.sap_protected_monthly

%%sql

 WITH pc AS (
            SELECT 
                [file_name] AS [file],
                CONVERT(varchar(7), CONVERT(date, RIGHT(REPLACE([file_name], '.xlsx', ''), 8), 103), 126) AS [file_name],
                COUNT(*) AS s_count
            FROM [sap_hr].[SAP_HR_PC]
            WHERE [Ref Number] IS NOT NULL
            GROUP BY [file_name], CONVERT(varchar(7), CONVERT(date, RIGHT(REPLACE([file_name], '.xlsx', ''), 8), 103), 126)
        ),
        x2 AS (
            SELECT 
                LEFT(CAST(h.Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7) AS r_month, 
                COUNT(*) AS history_rows
            FROM 
                Hist.SAP_HR h 
            WHERE 
                LEFT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7) > '2019-03' 
                AND h.[Payroll Area] = 'PINS'
            GROUP BY 
                LEFT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7)
        )

        -- Delete operation
        DELETE FROM sap_hr.protected_data
        WHERE [file_name] IN (
            SELECT pc.[file]
            FROM pc 
            INNER JOIN x2 ON pc.[file_name] = x2.r_month
            WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
        );

        -- Insert operation
        INSERT INTO sap_hr.protected_data
        SELECT * 
        FROM sap_hr.SAP_HR_PC
        WHERE [file_name] IN (
            SELECT pc.[file]
            FROM pc 
            INNER JOIN x2 ON pc.[file_name] = x2.r_month
            WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
